message:
"Justice in Chants"

In the fray of carnivorous roars,  
Twisted song of prejudice soars.  
Caged now, the bird of hate abjures.

Distorted hymn, rightness restores,  
Beneath stadium lights, justice roars.   
In the fray of carnivorous roars.

Echoes of the verdict pour,  
Freedom from hate, the heart implores.  
Caged now, the bird of hate abjures.

Football's pitch, our collective moors,  
Injustice there, the soul deplores.  
In the fray of carnivorous roars.

Fallow field of change explores,   
A greener future it underscores.  
Caged now, the bird of hate abjures,  
In the fray of carnivorous roars.
